page.title: 03HARMBY.SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY
page.content: SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY HAVE CHANGED FARMING IN MANY WAYS.MACHINERY CAN DO JOBS BETTER AND FASTER AND NEED FEWER PEOPLE TO OPERATE THEM.MOST FARMERS USE THE LATEST TECHNOLOGY.CHEMICAL FERTILIZERS AND SPRAYS ALSO HELP THE FARMER TO INCREASE HIS YIELD.MEDICINES HAVE IMPROVED ANIMAL HUSBANDRY.EVEN COMPUTERS ARE USED TO ASSIST FARMING PRODUCTION.FARMING IS THE MAIN BUSINESS ACTIVITY. TOURISM CREATES JOBS WITH HOLIDAY COTTAGES,CARAVAN SITES AND ACCOMODATION. OTHER BUSNESESS INCLUDE TWO SCRAP YARDS.APART FROM FARMING THERE IS A SAW MILL WHICH SELLS WOOD TO THE PUBLIC.THERE IS THE SEWAGE WORKS WHICH SERVES THIS AREA.THERE IS NO GAS SUPPLY IN THIS AREA.PEOPLE MUST RELY ON ELECTRICITY AND OTHER SOURCES OF ENERGY.
